about_the_game:
Lieutenant Lani Goodspeed, call sign "Tango-2-6," First Squadron, 3rd Orbital Cover Regiment, graduated with honors from Earth Alliance Space Forces Flight School.
After graduation, she joins a unit on the Star Carrier for further duty.
Three days later she takes off on her first combat mission...

  • Gameplay

    Implementation of planetary and space battles in 2D side-scrolling shooter mechanics. Different flight modes, high-speed maneuvering between obstacles, flying in the air or in outer space and firing at numerous enemies, protection and covering of allied troops, storming of enemy fortifications are waiting for you.

  • Storyline

    The story is narrated on behalf of Lieutenant Lani Goodspeed of the Space Forces. Earth has been attacked by an alien race of mechanoids and humanity is embroiled in a space war to defend its home planet. In this game you'll find out what role our heroine played in the fate of Earth.

  • Missions

    Five missions to different parts of our solar system. The command has developed a plan to free the solar system, in the implementation of which we will take a special place.

  • Enemies

    An alien race of mechanoids. Their army consists of drones of various classes: small, medium, large, and titans. They have technological superiority over Earthlings, powerful weapons, modular interchangeable structure, complex hierarchy of units. Defeating them is a major challenge.

  • Bossfights

    In the enemy ranks there are drones of various sizes, up to giants, class "Titan", to defeat which, you have to look for their weaknesses and special tactics.

  • Fighter

    The latest SRJF S-600 M23 "Interceptor" close-range jet fighter. Main orbital cover combat unit and can also function as a support aircraft. Capable of operating both in and out of the atmosphere, but at short distances from launch vehicle.

  • Weapons and bonuses

    Several types of weapons, with different principles of action, external and remote modules that increase firepower or give other tactical advantages, as well as fire support from allied units.

  • And remember: your resources are not endless!

name: Orbital Patrol: The Lani Goodspeed Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Any dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB of VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended

short_description: Implementation of planetary and space battles in 2D side-scrolling shooter mechanics. The story of Lieutenant Lani Goodspeed about fighting a mechanoid race of alien invaders.
supported_languages:
Russian*, English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
